attributes.action: To reject any treaties or future treaty agreements arising from the Copenhagen climate conference until a full criminal investigation has been carried out in to the contents of leaked emails, data files, program data and the University of East Anglia Climate Research Unit’s admitted fraudulent practices and manipulation of climate data.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The leaked emails, data files, program data etc. from the University of East Anglia’s (UEA) Climate Research Unit (CRU) have largely been ignored or played down by the main-stream media.  The UEA have admitted that the leaked data ‘is’ theirs and the emails, data files, programs etc. are genuine.  The information contained in this leaked data allegedly implies that scientist’s from around the world working with the CRU have manipulated or been advised to manipulate climate and other data to conform to the CRU’s preferred results.  The CRU’s results have gone to make up the IPCC’s findings concerning Global Warming Theory, in turn this theory has been put forward as the foundation of the Copenhagen Treaty.  If the Copenhagen Treaty where to be ratified by the governments of the world it would be an endorsement based on a gross deception and a deep embarrassment to all signatories.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
